backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping theme updates and hardcoded color cleanup to associated frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files including styles, config, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark CSS variables for color tokens, radii, borders, and layout surfaces.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx into a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component combining layout, tabs, catalog loading, public viewer, and admin area with CRUD handlers.
Admin container composing banner manager, upload form, and catalog manager.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBanne: Admin tool for uploading, validating, previewing, and removing a fixed‑size banner image with local storage persistence.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCatal: Admin table listing catalog items with remove actions and confirmation prompts.
Login gate enforcing admin authentication with credential check, session persistence, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUploa: A form component for admins to add catalog items with fields for metadata, labels, media type, and source.
frontend/src/components/layout/Backgroun: Renders a fixed background image with a gradient overlay.
frontend/src/components/layout/MasparLay: Defines the main app layout with background, header, footer, and social links wrapping page content.
frontend/src/components/public/Collectio: Displays selectable collection cards showing names, icons, and item counts.
Renders a grid of catalog items with media previews and applies content protection.
frontend/src/components/public/PublicVie: Main public catalog viewer with search, filters, collections, item grid, and media modal.
frontend/src/components/public/SearchAnd: Search bar and collection/language filter controls for public item browsing.
frontend/src/components/viewers/ImageZoo: Image viewer with zoom and rotation controls.
frontend/src/components/viewers/MediaVie: Modal that displays images, videos, or PDFs with content protection.
frontend/src/components/viewers/PdfFirst: Shows a preview of the first page of a PDF via iframe.
frontend/src/components/viewers/VideoVie: Simple video player with download restrictions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalog.ts: React hook managing catalog state, loading from localStorage, seeding defaults, and providing add/remove/refresh methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color variables, dark mode settings, and utility classes including glass effects and gradients.
frontend/src/lib/adminAuth.ts: Simple admin auth using hardcoded credentials and localStorage for tracking unlock state.
frontend/src/lib/bannerStorage.ts: LocalStorage CRUD utilities for storing and retrieving banner image metadata.
frontend/src/lib/catalogStorage.ts: LocalStorage persistence helpers for catalog items, including load, save, add, remove, and update.
frontend/src/lib/catalogTypes.ts: Type definitions for catalog items, labels, and media types.
frontend/src/lib/collections.ts: Default collection list and helper to merge catalog-derived collections with defaults.
frontend/src/lib/contentProtection.ts: Functions to disable context menus and drag events to protect content elements.
frontend/src/lib/labelLanguage.ts: LocalStorage helpers for storing and retrieving the selected label language.
frontend/src/lib/predefinedLabels.ts: List of allowed predefined labels and a type guard to validate them.
frontend/src/lib/seedCatalog.ts: Seed catalog entries used to initialize storage when empty.
frontend/src/lib/uiText.ts: Centralized UI text strings for headers, navigation, admin, public viewer, and footer.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, containers, shadows, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, requirements, architectural constraints, known issues, and existing features for a CodePen‑ready HTML/CSS/JS Maspar sales portal. Marks this update as a fix request and outlines theme changes, localStorage usage, and UI/UX expectations.
